name: The World Is A Work In Progress
name_original: The World Is A Work In Progress
description:
The World Is A Work In Progress
  • Use Chrome, Firefox or Edge only – does not work on Safari
  • Game requires keyboard and mouse 
  • Click run game button, click fullscreen button, click inside game to hide mouse
  • Use arrow keys to move, mouse to look
  • Esc button to gain control of mouse 
  • Esc button to exit fullscreen
  • Follow the platform and venture through the archways 
  • This ‘game’ has no end – play and observe for as long as you want

Credits:

Created by Ama Dogbe

Sound produced by Louis Jack

Technical support by Kwame Dogbe
